Package game.data

Class ValueManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.data.ValueManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    K
    public class ValueManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements K
    This class takes care of managing values such as position strings and direction characters by generating different types of output.

        public static boolean charIsDirection​(char c)
        Checks if the provided direction is a valid direction.
        Parameters:
        c - Provided direction-character.
        Returns:
        true if the provided character is a direction. false otherwise.
